author: Ted Byrne
content:
Of course it is not a sad image. As I have past commented... you have an ebullient spirit that burbles into your graphics even when you are feeling moody. Maybe it is "style" maybe it is an optimistic spirit - wuddever... this is just another example of an exuberant palette described in an inviting texture. The abstract is fanciful. You see things I wish I saw. Thanks Andreas...

Ted
